description: This header defines the 'LocalStore' class, which implements the 'ILocalStore' interface for managing local database operations in the WPEFramework Plugin namespace. It includes methods for opening a database, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entry counts and entries, removing entries, and adding entries, as well as private helper functions and member variables for database connection handling.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: A class implementing the ILocalStore interface, providing local database operations such as opening connections, creating tables, inserting, deleting, and querying entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a database connection to the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the database.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries for a specific table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a specified range in a table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Fetches a list of entries from a table starting at a given index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries within a range from a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
